name: Generic Pirate Game
description:
Instructions:

Movement:
W move the ship forward
A rotate the ship to the left / anticlockwise
S rotate the ship to the right / clockwise

Actions:

Arrow key Up to shot forward
Arrow key left shot cannons on the left of the ship
Arrow key right shoot cannons on the right of the ship

The game source can be found in my gitHub: https://github.com/cpluiz/genericPirateGame
